title: Implications of the 2018 US Elections for Women's Representation in the Democratic and Republican Parties
description: In this episode of the Political Research Quarterly podcast series, Diana O'Brien (Texas A&M University) interviews Michele Swers (Georgetown University) and Danielle Thomsen (University of California, Irvine) on their PRQ article "Which Women Can Run? Gender, Partisanship, and Candidate Donor Networks," and the implications of the 2018 elections for women's representation in politics.
